quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: - Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: - George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: - Robert Collier

quotes.text: The true measure of progress is not in how far you’ve come, but in how far you’re willing to go.
quotes.author: - Anonymous

quotes.text: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: - Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: - Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: - Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Change is inevitable, but progress is optional.
quotes.author: - Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: - George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: The path to progress is often slow, but it is through consistent steps forward that we achieve our greatest accomplishments.
quotes.author: - Anonymous

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: - Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: - William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: - John Lennon

quotes.text: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand.
quotes.author: - Randy Pausch

quotes.text: Progress is the real challenge. The way forward is never easy, but it is always worth it.
quotes.author: - Anonymous
